comments:
While trying to install the JBoss-IDE v1.2.2 for Eclipse 2.1 via Install/Update,
progressing through:

1. Feature Install (hit Next)
2. Feature License (select "accept" and hit Next)

results in an empty window of Install Locations.  Not selecting an install
location (nothing to select!) and hitting Finish results in the NPE shown below.
 Selecting a new install location results in "Target install location must be
selected.  If none is available, create a new one."  Selecting an existing
install location (pre-existing directory) results in "Target location already
exists."
